question: a certain company that sells only cars and trucks reported that revenues from car sales in 1997 were down 11 percent from 1996 and revenues from truck sales were up 7 percent from 1996 . if total revenues from car sales and truck sales in 1997 were up 1 percent from 1996 , what is the ratio q of revenue from car sales in 1996 to revenue from truck sales in 1996 ?
a , b and c invested rs . 6300 , rs . 4200 and rs . 10500 respectively , in a partnership business . find the share of a in profit of rs . 13600 after a year ?
when positive integer x is divided by positive integer y , the remainder is 12 . if x / y = 75.12 , what is the value of y ?

10 years ago , the average age of a family of 4 members was 24 years . two children having been born ( with age diference of 2 years ) , the present average age of the family is the same . the present age of the youngest child is :
the average of first four prime numbers greater than 10 is ?
the average age of 39 students in a group is 14 years . when teacher ' s age is included to it , the average increases by one . what is the teacher ' s age in years ?
30 square stone slabs of equal size were needed to cover a floor area of 58.8 sq . m . find the length of each stone slab ?

john and amanda stand at opposite ends of a straight road and start running towards each other at the same moment . their rates are randomly selected in advance so that john runs at a constant rate of 2 , 3 , 4 , or 5 miles per hour and amanda runs at a constant rate of 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , or 7 miles per hour . what is the probability that john has traveled farther than amanda by the time they meet ?

david and andrew can finish the work 12 days if they work together . they worked together for 8 days and then andrew left . david finished the remaining work in another 8 days . in how many days david alone can finish the work ?

a man cycling along the road noticed that every 3 minutes a bus overtakes him and every 9 minutes he meets an oncoming bus . if all buses and the cyclist move at a constant speed , what is the time interval between consecutive buses ?
the cost of 16 pens and 8 pencils is rs . 352 and the cost of 4 pens and 4 pencils is rs . 96 . find the cost of each pen ?

the wages earned by robin is 30 % more than that earned by erica . the wages earned by charles is 60 % more than that earned by erica . how much % is the wages earned by charles more than that earned by robin ?
walking at 5 / 6 th of its usual speed a cab is 5 mnts late . find its usual time to cover the journey ?

a car is purchased on hire - purchase . the cash price is $ 23 000 and the terms are a deposit of 10 % of the price , then the balance to be paid off over 60 equal monthly instalments . interest is charged at 12 % p . a . what is the monthly instalment ?

a specialized type of sand consists of 40 % mineral x by volume and 60 % mineral y by volume . if mineral x weighs 2.5 grams per cubic centimeter and mineral y weighs 2 grams per cubic centimeter , how many grams does a cubic meter of specialized sand combination weigh ? ( 1 meter = 100 centimeters )

a train is travelling at 48 kmph . it crosses another train having half of its length , travelling in opposite direction at 42 kmph , in 12 seconds . it also passes a railway platform in 45 seconds . what is the length of the platform ?
the average of 9 observations was 7 , that of the 1 st of 5 being 10 and that of the last 5 being 8 . what was the 5 th observation ?

an advertising agency finds that , of its 180 clients , 115 use television , 110 use radio and 130 use magazines . also , 85 use television and magazines , 75 use television and radio , 95 use radio and magazines . how many use all the 3 ?
each of the positive integers a and c is a 4 - digit integer . if each of the digits 0 through 9 appears in one of these 3 integers , what is the maximum possible value of the sum of a and c ?
speed of a boat in standing water is 9 kmph and the speed of the stream is 6 kmph . a man rows to place at a distance of 210 km and comes back to the starting point . the total time taken by him is :
a person can swim in still water at 4 km / h . if the speed of water 2 km / h , how many hours will the man take to swim back against the current for 12 km ?
the speed at which a man can row a boat in still water is 15 km / hr . if he rows downstream , where the speed of current is 3 km / hr , how many seconds will he take to cover 110 meters ?
in an election between two candidates , the first candidate got 80 % of the votes and the second candidate got 240 votes . what was the total number of votes ?
in a dairy farm , 45 cows eat 45 bags of husk in 45 days . in how many days one cow will eat one bag of husk ?
shop offered 25 % offer for every shirt , smith bought a shirt at rs . 560 . and what was the shop ' s original selling price ?
there are 10 dozen mangoes in a box . if there are 36 such boxes , how many mangoes are there in all the boxes together ?
if a : b : : 3 : 7 , then what is ( 5 a + 6 b ) : ( a - 2 b ) ?
find the product of the local value and absolute value of 8 in 564823
is two years older than b who is twice as old as c . if the total of the ages of a , b and c be 32 , then how old is b ?
difference between the length & breadth of a rectangle is 10 m . if its perimeter is 206 m , then its area is ?
a train running at the speed of 110 km / hr crosses a pole in 9 sec . what is the length of the train ?
how many multiples of 2 are there between 0 and 100 , exclusive ?

paul and jack are 2 mechanics who work 8 hours per day changing oil in cars at the oil spot . if paul can change oil in 2 cars per hour , and jack can change oil in 3 cars per hour . what is the least number of cars per work day the 2 men can finish ?

for an agricultural experiment , 300 seeds were planted in one plot and 200 were planted in a second plot . if exactly 25 percent of the seeds in the first plot germinated and exactly 40 percent of the seeds in the second plot germinated , what percent of the total number of seeds germinated ?
reeya obtained 40 , 60 , 70 , 80 and 80 out of 100 in different subjects , what will be the average
a shopkeeper sells 300 metres of cloth for rs . 9000 at a loss of rs . 6 per metre . find his cost price for one metre of cloth ?
if ( a + b ) = 4 , ( b + c ) = 9 and ( c + d ) = 3 , what is the value of ( a + d ) ?
20 % of a 6 litre solution and 60 % of 4 litre solution are mixed . what percentage of the mixture of solution

maxwell leaves his home and walks toward brad ' s house at the same time that brad leaves his home and runs toward maxwell ' s house . if the distance between their homes is 20 kilometers , maxwell ' s walking speed is 4 km / h , and brad ' s running speed is 6 km / h , what is the distance traveled by brad ?
a 15 % stock yielding 12 % is quoted at :

a merchant has selected two items to be placed on sale , one of which currently sells for 25 percent less than the other . if he wishes to raise the price of the cheaper item so that the two items are equally priced , by what percentage must he raise the price of the less expensive item ?
lilly has 10 fish and rosy has 8 fish . in total , how many fish do they have in all ?
if it takes 10 kids 6 hours to wear out their teacher , how long would it take 15 kids ?
a man can row downstream at the rate of 45 kmph and upstream at 23 kmph . find the man ’ s rate in still water and rate of current ?
if the radius of a cylinder is doubled and height 4 times , what is the new volume of the cylinder divided by the old one ?
if rs . 1440 / - are divided among a , b and c so that a receives 1 / 3 rd as much as b and b receives 1 / 4 th as much as c . the amount b received is ?
a train passes a station platform in 36 sec and a man standing on the platform in 20 sec . if the speed of the train is 63 km / hr . what is the length of the platform ?

a man purchased 1 blankets @ rs . 100 each , 5 blankets @ rs . 150 each and two blankets at a certain rate which is now slipped off from his memory . but he remembers that the average price of the blankets was rs . 150 . find the unknown rate of two blankets ?
two trains 200 m and 300 m long run at the speed of 60 km / hr and 40 km / hr respectively in opposite directions on parallel tracks . the time which they take to cross each other is ?
